p: The normal heart rate of zebrafish embryos ranges from 120 to 180 bpm [ 29, 30]. The zebrafish heart rates at 72 hpf with different concentrations are shown in Figure 5B. There was no significant difference between the means of the heart rates of the ZO essential oil (0.24 µg/mL)-treated group and the 0.1% DMSO-treated group (control). The average heart rate declined at higher concentrations. No heartbeat was detected at 72 hpf in any zebrafish embryos treated with 3.91 µg/mL of ZO essential oil due to embryo death.
